author: Linus Tech Tips
description:
Thanks to MSI for sponsoring this video! Check out their MPG 341CQR QD-OLED X36 at https://msi.gm/SD4A11AF today!
Disclaimer: The Pureblack + 3H Hardness has been renamed to DarkArmor Film, and the HDR Curve customization has been renamed to Uniform Luminance since the filming of this video.

MSI sent over their brand new MPG 341CQR QD-OLED X36 for us to check out and truly experience the hype around 5th gen QD-OLED panels. It's brighter, more resistant to scratching, and has an RGB Stripe sub-pixel layout.

title: I'm increasing my size and surface hardness.

author: Linus Tech Tips
description:
Thanks to ASUS ROG for sponsoring this video! Check out their all new PG34WCDN QD-OLED and the rest of their ROG OLED gaming monitors using our links: 
ROG OLED Gaming Monitors: https://rog.gg/OLEDmonitor_LTT
ROG Swift PG34WCDN Monitor: https://rog.gg/CES26_PG34WCDN_LTT

5th Gen QD-OLED panels are here, and what better way to test them then by playing games that have been heavily modded to look as real as possible. I'm talking Cyberpunk looking true-to-life, Skyrim looking like Skyrim 2, and a secret game requested by Linus.
